constream.label: z_steps
constream.description: The amount of zsteps (around midpoint). Defaults to 2.

constream.label: z_step
constream.description: The z-step to take in um. Defaults to 0.3

nodes.name: Acquire Stack
nodes.description:
Acquire a 3D image stack, allowing to move to a new Position, setting 
an Objective, and an active channel.

nodes.name: Segment Flou2
nodes.description: Segments Cells using the stardist flou2 pretrained model

instream.label: rep
instream.description: The image to label outliers for

constream.label: max_size
constream.description: The maximum size of a cluster (threshold for number of labels in a cluster)

constream.label: c
constream.description: The channel to use. Defaults to 0.

constream.label: t
constream.description: The timepoint to use. Defaults to 0.

constream.label: z
constream.description: The z-slice to use. Defaults to 0.

constream.label: limit
constream.description: The maximum number of clusters to return. Defaults to None.

nodes.name: Mark Clusters
nodes.description:
Takes a masked image and marks rois based on dense clusters of a certain size 
and density of their center of mass

outstream.label: Element ofreturn0
outstream.description: Element ofThe rois for the clusters

outstream.label: height
outstream.description: The height of the ROI in microns

outstream.label: width
outstream.description: The width of the ROI in microns

nodes.name: Rectangular Roi to Dimensions
nodes.description:
Measures the size of a Rectangular Roi in microns
(only works for Rectangular ROIS)

nodes.name: Roi to Position
nodes.description: Transforms a ROI into a Position on the governing stage

instream.label: height
instream.description: The height of the ROI in microns

instream.label: width
instream.description: The width of the ROI in microns

outstream.label: height
outstream.description: The height of the ROI in microns

outstream.label: width
outstream.description: The width of the ROI in microns

instream.description: The height of the ROI in microns

instream.label: width
instream.description: The width of the ROI in microns

outstream.label: height
outstream.description: The height of the ROI in microns

outstream.label: width
outstream.description: The width of the ROI in microns

port.label: position
port.description: The position to move to (maps to arkid-a8a2e7c1-f757-4983-a106-4f3ce0c171c7.position)

port.label: distance
port.description: The distance between points in a cluster (eps in DBSCAN) (maps to Mark Clusters)

port.label: min_size
port.description: The minimum size of a cluster (min_samples in DBSCAN) (maps to Mark Clusters)

port.label: max_size
port.description: The maximum size of a cluster (threshold for number of labels in a cluster) (maps to Mark Clusters)

port.label: limit
port.description: The maximum number of clusters to return. Defaults to None. (maps to  Mark Clusters)

port.label: Number
port.description: The number to add to each stream item (maps to Add)

port.label: objective
port.description: The objective to use (maps to Acquire Stack)

port.label: z_steps
port.description: The amount of zsteps (around midpoint). Defaults to 2. (maps to Acquire Stack)

port.label: z_step
port.description: The z-step to take in um. Defaults to 0.3 (maps to  Acquire Stack)
